description.en: The web-based course revises and expands the knowledge of grammar on prepositions, the rection of the verb and pronouns. Every grammar topic will be introduced by a theoretical part that gives the rules and examples and which is followed by self-test exercises, graded tests and finally, the final test.
description.et: Veebipõhisel kursusel korratakse ja laiendatakse grammatikaalaseid teadmisi eessõna, tegusõna rektsiooni ja asesõna kasutamise osas. Iga grammatikateema algab teoreetilise osaga, kus on antud reeglid ja näidislaused, sellele järgnevad enesetestid, siis hindelised testid ja lõputest.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to expand the students' knowledge of  prepositions, the rection of the verb and pronouns.
objectives.et: Parandada teadmisi eessõna, tegusõna rektsiooni ja asesõna kasutamise osas.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the course, the students will have improved their knowledge of the covered grammar topics and they are able to apply the knowledge both in oral and written speech.
learning_outcomes.et: Pärast kursuse läbimist on üliõpilase grammatikaalased oskused läbitud teemade piires paranenud ning ta oskab omandatud teadmisi suuliselt ja kirjulikult rakendada.

independent_work.et:
This course consists of three parts - prepositions, the rection of the verb and pronouns. All of the parts are available and can be printed out in the Moodle system. Every part has links to the according grammar chapters, self-test exercises and graded tests together with the task descriptions. Grammar rules can further be checked from the recommended study materials.

RECOMMENDATION: before completing the exercises, it would be wise to get to read through the theoretical part of the grammar topic, the concise tables and comments with examples will make the topics easier to remember.

grade_preconditions.et:
The number of times you can take the self-test exercises is unlimited. The teacher cannot see these results. 

The graded tests of all chapters consist of interim tests and the final test. In order to get a "Pass", it is necessary to get a positive result (at least 51% of the points) in all interim and final tests. It is possible to take the graded tests for the second time if the first attempt was less than 51%.

The tests come with a time limit. It is different in the case of each test. When you are in the middle of the test, it is visible how much time is given and how much time is still left.

NB! If the self-test exercise or the graded test require using the letter ß, you can use the following keyboard combinations: the keys Alt 0223 / Alt Gr 0223 or letters "ss".

The period of three weeks has been given to learn each topic. At the beginning of the course, the graded tests of all three topics are available, but after the three weeks for each topic is over, the respective test will close. At the end of the course, there is one additional week given to eliminate any shortcomings. In the case of graded tests, you will find out your results right away (except for the picture assignment: relative pronoun C). Before taking the relative pronoun C test, it is highly recommended to take the preliminary test, which is also available on the page of graded tests. It is possible to see the scores of the graded tests on the menu on the left from "My grades". 

On the main page in Moodle, there are three forums available:
1. News and information - this is the place where the teachers can post additional information about the course.
2. Issues - the students can turn to the teachers or fellow students if they should have any questions or issues regarding the exercises and test.
3. Freies Gespräch - the students can talk to each other in German, preferably, regarding matters of this course and other topics.

debt_elimination.et: Any shortcomings have to be eliminated by 2 December.
